message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60, you take 40.  What do you say?
Your turn! I think we should switch it up this time.
Okay, I'll compromise a bit.  Let's split it 55/45, with me taking the larger share this time.  It's still a good deal for both of us.
This is getting ridiculous. It's only fair we split it evenly before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
